text: The Adelphi Papers is a monograph series in which the policy-related original academic research of the International Institute for Strategic Studies is principally published. The series was established in 1961 and continues today.The Adelphi Papers The publications are required to be about 28,000 to 30,000 words—longer than typical journal articles, but shorter than books. About eight Adelphi papers are published annually, and 385 issues have been published from 1961 to 2006.Full list of Adelphi Papers (user account required) ==See also== *Chaillot Papers ==References== Category:Works about politics Category:Publications established in 1961
title: Adelphi Papers
